Title: Elephants and Hens
Plot: It is International Children's Book Week, and Bernard and Manny decide to write their own kids' classic and retire on the proceeds. Fran is off on a hen weekend, but still finds a way to fall out with Bernard and Manny.
Writer: Dylan Moran, Andy Riley, Kevin Cecil
GuestStars: Lucy Davis, Pandora Colin, Olivia Colman, Tony Bignell, Oliver Golding, Camilla Heaney, Charlie Hicks
